issue.title: [CF 1517] Blade Flurry tracking
issue.body:
I'm using two different groups for tracking both my uptime on Blade Flurry and the spell cooldown itselfs.

 

When I'm at two Blade Flurry charges at use the spell I can see both the uptime timer and the spell cooldown numbers on the same icon.

 

Picture:

https://gyazo.com/ae55d21c34c2ce6c61fdadd33fe0625b

 

If you zoom in you can see that uptime timer is showing behind the spell cooldown timer. The icon gets really messy.


> Posted by CurseForge user binqie | Imported from CurseForge issue #1517 | Raw

comments.body:
Don't stack icons on top of one another. Use a meta icon if you want two different icons' data in the same location on screen.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
